titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd at the funeral of Sir Alan Broderick, Kt. who dyed at Wandsworth in the county of Surrey, on Thursday, November 25th, and was interr'd there on Friday, Decemb. 3d., 1680 / by Nathanael Resbury ... .
titleStmt.author: Resbury, Nathanael, 1643-1711.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: cropped, with loss of print.
